property.name: sqlForColumn
property.value: (SELECT MIN(s1.BEG_DATE) FROM WORK_PLAN s1 WHERE s1.GROUP_ID = MAIN.GROUP_ID)

property.name: sqlForColumn
property.value: (SELECT MAX(s2.END_DATE) FROM WORK_PLAN s2 WHERE s2.GROUP_ID = MAIN.GROUP_ID)

property.name: message
property.value: Дата начала не должна быть позже, чем дата окончания.

property.name: strOrderByStart
property.value: SCS.STAGE_NUMBER ASC, cast(dbo.RecursivePartSortNUM(dbo.RecursiveStringNUM(MAIN.WORK_NUMBER),1) as int) ASC, cast(dbo.RecursivePartSortNUM(dbo.RecursiveStringNUM(MAIN.WORK_NUMBER),2) as int) ASC, cast(dbo.RecursivePartSortNUM(dbo.RecursiveStringNUM(MAIN.WORK_NUMBER),3) as int) ASC, cast(dbo.RecursivePartSortNUM(dbo.RecursiveStringNUM(MAIN.WORK_NUMBER),4) as int) ASC, cast(dbo.RecursivePartSortNUM(dbo.RecursiveStringNUM(MAIN.WORK_NUMBER),5) as int) ASC, cast(dbo.RecursivePartSortNUM(dbo.RecursiveStringNUM(MAIN.WORK_NUMBER),6) as int) ASC, MAIN.BEG_DATE, MAIN.WORK_PLAN_ID

property.name: message
property.value: Дата начала не должна быть позже, чем дата окончания.

property.name: strOrderByStart
property.value: MAIN.CONTRACT_STAGE_ID DESC, MAIN.WORK_PLAN_ID ASC, MAIN.WORK_PLAN_AUDIT_ID DESC
